title: Chantell S. (Verified ZocDoc User)'s Review of Dr. Nahal Heyrani - DDS (5/5) on ZocDoc

organizations.name: university of california, irvine school of biological sciences

text: Cosmetic Dentist Professional Statement For many, high school can be a time of great uncertainty and confusion-, but not for Dr. Heyrani. By the time she graduated, she knew exactly what she wanted to be: a dentist. For Dr. Heyrani, cosmetic and general dentistry provided the perfect opportunity to combine her passion for science and deep interest in art. After completing her studies at the University of California, Irvine School of Biological Sciences, Dr. Heyrani went on to obtain her Doctor of Dental Surgery from the UCLA School of Dentistry. Dr. Heyrani continued her dental education and training at the prestigious Mount Sinai School of Medicine in New York City, where she performed her general practice residency. While in dental school, Dr. Heyrani was invited to join the distinguished Alpha Omega Dental Fraternity, the oldest organization of its kind in the world. Dr. Heyrani also belongs to the American Dental Association, the California Dental Association and the Academy of General Dentistry. Dr. Heyrani is fluent in English, Spanish and Farsi. She uses her expertise in cosmetic and implant dentistry to care for her patients and particularly enjoys working with patients of all ages to help them overcome their fears and to help them get the smile they desire in a comfortable and family oriented setting. Dr. Heyrani believes that prevention, education and regular visits are the best way to avoid discomfort and maintain exceptional oral health.
